entity.label: Account name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of Account name should be between 1 and 50
Account name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.

entity.label: Dynatrace Tenant
entity.help: If you are using Dynatrace Managed, include the environment ID: https://<tenant>/e/<environment>. Add-on forces mandatory HTTPS

validators.errorMsg: Length of tenant should be between 1 and 200

entity.label: Dynatrace API Token
entity.help: https://www.dynatrace.com/support/help/dynatrace-api/

validators.errorMsg: Length of token should be between 1 and 8192
Max host length is 4096
Max length of username is 50
Max length of password is 8192

options.saveValidator: function(formData) { if(!formData.proxy_enabled || formData.proxy_enabled === '0') {return true; } if(!formData.proxy_url) { return 'Proxy Host can not be empty'; } if(!formData.proxy_port) { return 'Proxy Port can not be empty'; } return true; }

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for the data input

validators.errorMsg: Input Name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.
Length of input name should be between 1 and 100

entity.label: Interval
entity.help: Time interval of input in seconds.

validators.errorMsg: Interval must be an integer.
Length of index name should be between 1 and 80.

entity.label: Dynatrace Collection Interval
entity.help: Relative timeframe passed to Dynatrace API. Timeframe of data to be collected at each polling interval.
